fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit

Class LoggingTestExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.LoggingTestExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension

    public class LoggingTestExtension
extends Object
implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback
    Write information about test. This is useful when there are many tests:
    • To quickly find the logs for the test
    • To quickly know if the test has failed or succeeded
    • To quickly identify the test failure
    • To quickly find failed tests
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggingTestExtension

        public LoggingTestExtension()
        No logger initialized (it will be initialized using annotation). If you use RegisterExtension annotation, please use another constructor.

      • LoggingTestExtension

        public LoggingTestExtension(int maxLength)
        Initializes with the provided max line length. Uses Slf4j logger and default marker ("test-info").
        Parameters:
        maxLength - the length of each line

      • LoggingTestExtension

        public LoggingTestExtension(int maxLength,
                            String marker)
        Initializes with the provided max line length and marker. Uses Slf4j logger.
        Parameters:
        maxLength - the length of each line
        marker - the marker for logs

      • LoggingTestExtension

        public LoggingTestExtension(int maxLength,
                            String marker,
                            Printer logger)
        Parameters:
        maxLength - the length of each line
        marker - the marker for logs
        logger - the logger
